s3607: Year 3: Led the feudal lords to save Zheng.
s3609: Year 8: Attacked Zheng because they served Jin.
s3623: Year 4: Attacked Qin, took Shao Liang. Qin took our Bei Zheng.
s3624: Year 4: Jin attacked us, took Shao Liang. We attacked Jin and took Bei Zheng.
s3637: Year 11: Defeated Chang Di at Xian and returned, obtained Chang Di.
s3642: Year 4: Defeated Chang Di at Chang Qiu.
s3655: Year 6: Qin took our Ji Ma. Fought Qin at He Qu; Qin army retreated.
s3656: Year 6: Attacked Jin, took Ji Ma. Angry, fought us great battle at He Qu.
s3672: Year 7: Jin deceived and obtained Sui Hui.
s3684: Year 6: Qing Wang died. Nobles contended for government, so did not announce.
s3686: Year 20: Zhao Gong died. Younger brother Shang Ren killed crown prince and self-established, was Yi Gong.
s3687: Year 8: Zhao Dun with 800 chariots installed Jie Kui, pacified the royal house.
s3701: Year 15: Sixth month Xin Chou, solar eclipse; Qi attacked us.
s3709: Year 34: Jin attacked us. Zhuang Hou died.
s3710: Year 6: Qi entered our outer wall.
s3718: Year 2: Did not obtain the people's hearts.
s3722: Year 9: Xiang Furen made Wei Bo kill Zhao Gong. Younger brother Bao established.
s3735: Year 11: Led the feudal lords to pacify Song.
s3738: Song Wen Gong Bao, first year. Zhao Gong's younger brother. Jin led feudal lords to pacify us.
s3749: Year 18: Xiang Zhong killed the legitimate heir and established concubine son as Xuan Gong.
s3750: Year 4: The duke cut off Bing Shou Fu's feet and took Yan Zhi's wife; the two together killed the duke and established Huan Gongzi as Hui Gong.
s3767: Year 13: Zhao Dun saved Chen and Song, attacked Zheng.
s3769: Year 6: Attacked Song and Chen because they broke their service to Jin.
s3770: Year 3: Chu and Zheng attacked us because we broke Chu.
